theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Disease and Cancer Suppression
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on CR reducing cancer incidence and delaying age-related diseases by modulating oxidative damage, immune aging, hormonal changes, and DNA repair.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Disease and Cancer Suppression
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes CR slowing aging by inhibiting chronic diseases through hormonal and growth factor modulation and disease-specific windows.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Disease and Cancer Suppression
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights CR reducing somatic mutation accumulation and oxidative DNA damage, linking mutation suppression to aging and cancer reduction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Disease and Cancer Suppression
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes CR extending lifespan and preventing autoimmune disease progression by maintaining immune competence and reducing pathology.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Disease and Cancer Suppression

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Disease and Cancer Suppression
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes CR lifespan extension may be due to prevention of overfeeding-related diseases, linking CR effects to disease modulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Disease and Cancer Suppression
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes CR extending lifespan and delaying aging by improving metabolic health and reducing age-related diseases across species.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Gene Expression Reprogramming

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes CR modulating gene expression to preserve immune function, hormone-regulated proteins, and reduce oncogene expression linked to aging.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows CR extends yeast lifespan by altering nutrient sensing and metabolic gene pathways independent of Sir2, highlighting gene regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Gene Expression Reprogramming
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details CR regulation of molecular pathways including AMPK, Fox transcription factors, mTOR inhibition, and IGF-1 downregulation affecting gene networks.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes CR effects on lifespan via conserved molecular pathways including TOR suppression, sirtuin activation, DNA repair, and autophagy gene regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Gene Expression Reprogramming
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on CR-induced mild metabolic stress triggering neuroprotective protein expression and reducing mitochondrial oxidative stress via gene changes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Somatotroph Axis and Hormonal Regulation
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on CR preserving pituitary growth hormone axis function and DNA repair capacity, linking hormonal regulation to aging modulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Immune System Preservation
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes CR attenuating immunosenescence by preserving immune cell function and modulating immune-related gene expression and signaling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Immune System Preservation
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights age-dependent CR effects on T-cell senescence, preserving naive T cells and reducing inflammation to delay immune aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Immune System Preservation
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows CR delays immune aging in primates by maintaining T cell diversity, reducing proinflammatory cytokines, and enhancing T cell proliferation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Reproductive and Oocyte Preservation
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on CR preventing oocyte aneuploidy and spindle defects, maintaining mitochondrial function, and extending reproductive lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Reproductive and Oocyte Preservation
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes CR preserving ovarian reserve and microenvironment, with timing and duration critical for delaying ovarian aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction Modulation of Aging via Reproductive and Oocyte Preservation
theory_assignments.reasoning: Although focused on energy allocation and trade-offs, this theory relates to physiological performance and reproductive health under CR, fitting with reproductive aging themes.
